\section*{Country XX2 and YY2}
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r}
dat <- read.csv("Assignment3_data.csv")
dat1 <- dat %>%
  filter(Country_Name %in% c("China",
                             "Japan")) %>%
  group_by(Country_Name) %>%
  summarise(CO2 = sum(CO2_emissions_metric_tons_per_capita))
kable(dat1)
```
